Text: This Is Me (Randy Travis album):  The tracks "Before You Kill Us All", "Whisper My Name", "This Is Me", and "The Box" were all released as singles, peaking at #2, #1, #5, and #8, respectively, on the "Billboard" country music charts.

3: "It Don't Get Any Better Than This"

Text: This Is Me (Randy Travis album):  "Small Y'all" was later recorded by George Jones on his 1998 album "It Don't Get Any Better Than This".
